remarks: Deduction for elimination by cases.  (Contributed by NM, 2-May-1996.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 7-May-2011.)
statement:
ecase3d.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> th ) ) $.
ecase3d.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> th ) ) $.
ecase3d.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( -. ( ps \/ ch ) -> th ) ) $.
ecase3d $p |- ( ph -> th ) $.
